div.p: Time series of standardized Sahel rainfall ( top) and time series of the dominant and trailing SVD modes of the predictors’ space p 1 ( middle) and p 2 ( bottom) for the single-model ensemble means of 29 CMIP5 models ( thin green, turquoise, and orange lines) and for the multi-model ensemble mean ( thick yellow, brown, and blue lines), from the historical simulations (1900–1999) in the left panels, and from the RCP8.5 simulations (2006–2099) in the right panels. The red lines represent observations
